name: HappyFacts
0:
”Alexa open happy facts”
”Alexa ask happy facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell happy facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy facts
des:
Ask for Happy Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter or space.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Happy Facts" or "Alexa, open Happy Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
